data.title: Tony Allen (basketball)
data.text:
Anthony Allen (amuru January 11, 1982), nke ikiri " Grindfather ," bụ onye ama ama n' egwuregwu mba America bụ onye gbara egwu 14 na National Basketball Association (NBA), nke bụ maka Boston. Celtics na Memphis Grizzlies. Ọ bụ onye otu oge isii na NBA All-Defensive Team, apụ nhọrọ nke otu mbụ. Allen meri ndị otu egwuregwu NBA na Boston Celtics na 2008.

. [1]Allen gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Crane na Chicago, ebe ọ na- ewu na onye ejedebe NBA ya Will Bynum . [1] Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ akwụkwọ na 2000–01, Allen gbakere 16.5 isi, nkwụghachi 6.1, yana izu ohi 2.8 na egwuregwu 32 (31 na-amalite) maka Butler County Community College . Akpọrọ aha nke abụọ Team All- Jayhawk West Conference na Jayhawk West Freshman nke Afọ

[1]ka onye sophomore, Allen ikike 14.5 isi na 5.3 nkwụghachi na egwuregwu 38 maka Wabash Valley College . O duuru Ndagwurugwu Wabash gaa na ndị 32–6 na-eme nke a anọ na nche NJCAA . E mechara eme nke abụọ nke Team All-Region XXIV

. [1]Maka oge nwata ya, Allen kwagara na Mahadum Oklahoma State, ebe ọ gbagoro isi 14.4 na nkwụghachi 5.4 na egwuregwu 32 (28 nkiri) na 2002–03. O mechara pịa ugwu Big 12 Newcomer of the Year

. [1]Ebe onye isi na 2003–04, Allen duuru Oklahoma State n'ịkpa akara (isi 16) ma duru ndị Cowboys gaa na 2004 NCAA Final Four ; o de igodo isi 13, nkwụghachi 4 na-ajụ 4 na mmeri nke Oklahoma State nke Georgia Tech na 3, 2004. E mechara mechaa Big 12 Player of the Year wee wee nweta ugwueze All-America site na Associated Press. Ka ọ na-erule njedebe nke oge 2003 – 04, Allen abụrụla onye mbụ na ndị Cowboys kpọrọ oke ọrụ 1,000 n'ime oge abụọ abụọ.

. [1]Ndị Boston Celtics debere Allen na agba nke mbụ (25th n'ozuzu) nke 2004 NBA draft na June 24, 2004, wee binye aka na nna ọtụtụ afọ na Celtics na July 3, 2004. Dị ka onye rookie na oge 2004 – 05, odi isi 6.4, nkwụghachi 2.9 na izu ohi 0.99 na okporo 16.4 iche egwuregwu 77 (mbido 34). Ọmeri isi 20 na mbụ mbụ nke na Jenụwarị 22, 2005, megide Atlanta Hawks . O mechara sonye na ihe ịma aka Rookie na 2005 NBA All-Star Weekend, na-enye akara 17 dị elu otu.

. [1]N' mbụ mbụ ya nke mgbasa ozi 2006 ya, Allen de ege isi 9, nkwụghachi 7, na izu ohi 2 n'oge mmeri egwuregwu ụlọ na Hawks. Na March 20, 2006, Allen dekọrọ oge-elu 18 isi na 4 na-ezu ohi na ụlọ na Los Angeles Lakers. O ke iso isi ihe iri na nke oge ya na 9, nke batara na mmeri nye New York Knicks . ịhụnanya ka e Emmanuel, ọ mebiri oge ya dị elu ka ọ meri 23 isi iji gaa na 4 rebounds na 3 zuru ohi na mmeri egwuregwu ụlọ na Cleveland Cavaliers . Allen gara n'ihu na nkezi 7.2 isi, 2.2 rebounds, 1.3 na-enyere aka na 1.00 zuru ohi na nsogbu 19.2 na egwuregwu 51 (mmalite ndụ) na oge sophomore ya na Celtics

Na Disemba 4, 2006, Allen meri isi ihe abụọ dị elu n'oge mmeri na Chicago Bulls . ahụmahụ ka e ịhụ, o ngosi 18 isi, 7 rebounds, na 5 zuru ohi na ọnwụ na Suns; 6 n'ime nkwụghachi 7 ya bụ ozighachi iwe iwe. Na Disemba 15, 2006, megide Denver Nuggets, Allen ike ọrụ-elu 30 isi na-aga na 8 rebounds. [1] Na January 7, 2007, Allen de nsọ isi 21, nkwụghachi 9, na 7 zuru ohi n'ụzọ mfu na Orlando Magic . N'ahọmpi megide Indiana Pacers na January 10, 2007, Allen tara yara n'oge na-agwụ anya mmiri nke ligament azụ azụ (ACL) na echekwara medial (MCL) nke ihe aka ekpe ya; [2] Allen, agbasa n'ala mgbe ọ dara n'ụzọ na-ahụ mma ka ọ gbasịrị mbọ ịgba ọsọ na-Mịna mgbagha, nke bịara mgbe ịfụchara, na ntaramahụhụ ikpeazụ nke mfu 97–84. [3] N'ime oge nke atɔ ya, Allen gbagoro ọrụ dị elu nke isi 11.5, nkwụghachi 3.8, mmemme 1.7 na izu ohi 1.5 kwa egwuregwu.

. [1]Allen gbakere na oge nke oge 2007–08. N'ozi mbụ ya na-ndị na ahụ, Allen meri 4 isi ma 5 nkwụghachi azụ n'oge mmeri na egwuregwu Washington Wizards . N'ime ọnụọgụgụ ọnụọgụ abụọ mbụ nke aha ahụ, Allen de mkpu isi 13 na mmeri ha meri New Jersey Nets na Nọvemba 14. O meri isi 20 dị elu n'oge na egwuregwu ụlọ megide Memphis Grizzlies . Ihe ahụ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ izu a ka e nwee, Allen kegidere oge ya elu n'oge mmeri okporo ụzọ na Miami Heat . Allen ụzọ 18 iji soro 4 rebounds na February 20, n'oge ọnwụ okporo ụzọ na Golden State Warriors . Na njedebe nke oge ọ llaa, ọ gbagoro isi 6.6, nkwụghachi 2.2, na 1.5 na-enyere aka na ndị 18.3 akụkụ egwuregwu 75 (11 nkiri). O nyere aka nke ukwuu na nche egwuregwu Celtics na-aga nke ọma nke butere na NBA Finals berth, ebe ha meri 2008 NBA Championship mgbe ha meri Los Angeles Lakers na egwuregwu isii

Na Julaị 2008, Allen debanyere aha Celtics ka ọ kwenye na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na-ekwe nkwa na-akwụ $ 2.5 nde kwa afọ. [2] [3] Allen gara n'ihu na isi 7.8, nkwụghachi 2.3, enyemaka 1.4, na izu ohi 1.17 na nkeji 19.3 na egwuregwu 46 (mbido abụọ) na oge nke ise ya na Celtics. [1]

Allen ọrụ enyemaka dị mkpa maka onye mmeri nke Eastern Conference Celtics n'oge oge 2009 – 10, na-ewe ihe dị ka isi 6.1, nkwụghachi 2.7, mmemme 1.3, na 1.07 zuru ohi na ndị egwuregwu 16.5 na egwuregwu 77 (malite) . O de ozi mbụ ugboro abụọ na isi iri na nkwụghachi 10 na Disemba 27, 2009 megide Los Angeles Clippers . N'ime egwuregwu 2010, Allen gbara n' siri 24 niile wee na-enwe isi 5.1 yana izu ohi 1.04 na ndị 16.3. [1] Ndị Celtics ruru 2010 NBA Finals, ebe ndị Lakers meri ha 4–3.

Na 2012–13, Allen duuru ndị egwuregwu niile na-anata votu maka ndị otu NBA All-Defensive, [4] na-aka akara nsọpụrụ otu egwuregwu niile kwụ ọtọ nke abụọ na nhọrọ NBA All-Defense nke atọ sochiri. Ọ gụchara nke ise na ịtụ vootu maka 2012 – 13 Defensive Player of the Year ka ọ gbasachara nkwụghachi ọrụ 4.6 dị elu yana izu ohi 1.51 na nkeji 26.7 na egwuregwu 79 dị elu (mmalite niile). N'ime egwuregwu egwuregwu 2013, Allen gbagoro n'ogo dị elu n'ofe bọọdụ na isi 10.3, 6.1 rebounds, 1.8 na-enyere aka, na 2 zuru ohi na nkeji 28.1 na egwuregwu 15 postseason, si otú a na-enyere Memphis aka ịga n'ihu na Western Conference Finals maka oge mbụ na akụkọ ntolite franchise. . [1]

. [5]Na Mee 2016, ikiri Allen na NBA All-Defensive Second Team maka oge 2015–16, na-aka akara ọrụ nke ise All-Defensive nhọrọ maka Allen na oge isii na Grizzlies. Allen ka isi 8.4, nkwụghachi 4.6, za 1.1 na izu ohi 1.72 na nhọrọ 25.3 na egwuregwu 64 (57 na-amalite) maka Memphis na 2015–16. Eji ozi ya na onye isi NBA na Ricky Rubio nke Minnesota na izu ohi kwa nbibi 48 (3.3) n'etiti ndị egwuregwu nwere opekata mpe 1,500 akpa. Ogo onwe Grizzlies bụ isi 2.2 dị mma na Allen n'ala (104.1) ụfọdụ ka ya na ya ike n'ala (106.3). Na mgbakwunye, Allen duuru otu ahụ na ohi 1.7 kwa egwuregwu

Na 2012–13, Allen duuru ndị egwuregwu niile na-anata votu maka ndị otu NBA All-Defensive, [6] na-aka akara nsọpụrụ otu egwuregwu niile kwụ ọtọ nke abụọ na nhọrọ NBA All-Defense nke atọ sochiri. Ọ gụchara nke ise na ịtụ vootu maka 2012 – 13 Defensive Player of the Year ka ọ gbasachara nkwụghachi ọrụ 4.6 dị elu yana izu ohi 1.51 na nkeji 26.7 na egwuregwu 79 dị elu (mmalite niile). N'ime egwuregwu egwuregwu 2013, Allen gbagoro n'ogo dị elu n'ofe bọọdụ na isi 10.3, 6.1 rebounds, 1.8 na-enyere aka, na 2 zuru ohi na nkeji 28.1 na egwuregwu 15 postseason, si otú a na-enyere Memphis aka ịga n'ihu na Western Conference Finals maka oge mbụ na akụkọ ntolite franchise. . [1]

Na July 15, 2013, Allen bịanyere aka na Grizzlies na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ ruru $ 20 nde. [7] [8] Allen kwubiri oge nke anọ ya na Memphis na 10th na NBA na nkezi nke 9 isi, 3.8 rebounds na 1.64 steals na .494 agbapụ na 23.2 nkeji na 55 egwuregwu (28 amalite). Ọ tụfuru egwuregwu 27 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ, ọrịa, ma ọ bụ nkwusioru otu egwuregwu. [1]

Ndị Grizzlies batara n'egwuregwu egwuregwu dị ka njikere nke asaa ma chere Oklahoma City Thunder ihu. Allen dekọrọ 10 nghachi iwe iwe na Game 4 ebubo Thunder, na-aghọ ebe nchekwa nke isii iji dekọọ 10+ iweghachi azụ na egwuregwu postseason 1986 Playoffs, na-ware John Salley, Roy Tarpley, Jayson Williams, Greg Ostertag na Jeff Foster . Ọ mechara biri 4 na isi 14 na nkwụghachi 13, na-aghọ Grizzlies nke abụọ iji debanye aha okpukpu abụọ na egwuregwu playoff, ngwaọrụ Lorenzen Wright (isi 10, 10 rebounds na fim 29, 2006). [1] Eluigwe mechara ndị Grizzlies na egwuregwu asaa

Na 2014–15, Allen gara n'ihu na-abụ onye mgbachitere mgbe ọ na-echekwa talent kacha mma nke otu mmegide. O mere NBA All-Defensive First Team nke atọ (na ọrụ nke anọ All-Defense accolade) mgbe ọ gbasịrị ọkwa nke anọ na otu egwuregwu izu ohi (2 pg) mgbe ọ na-egwu 26.2 nkeji kwa egwuregwu. Allen bụ naanị onye ọkpụkpọ na 2014–15 iji dekọọ opekata mpe egwuregwu atọ yana izu ohi isii ma ọ bụ karịa. [9]

Na June 26, 2017, akpọrọ Allen na NBA All-Defensive Second Team maka oge 2016–17, na-aka akara ọrụ nke isii All-Defensive nhọrọ maka Allen, ebe amatala ya na NBA All-Defensive Teams ugboro isii n'ime ya. oge asaa na Grizzlies. Allen pụtara na egwuregwu 71 (mbido 66) maka Memphis na 2016 – 17, na-enweta isi 9.1, nkwụghachi 5.5, enyemaka 1.4 yana otu 1.62 na-eduga izu ohi na nkeji 27 kwa egwuregwu. Ọ duuru otu egwuregwu ahụ na nkeji izu ohi (3.1), oge nke abụọ ya ka ọ duru otu egwuregwu na otu (4.1 na 2014 – 15). [10]

. [11]Na Septemba 15, 2017, Allen bịanyere aka na New Orleans Pelicans . [1] Na Nọvemba 1, 2017, o nwere isi 10 dị elu n'oge na nsogbu 19 site na bench na mfu 104 – 98 na Minnesota Timberwolves . [2] Na Disemba 10, 2017 megide Philadelphia 76ers, Allen ikike fibula aka ekpe gbajiri agbaji. Ọ na-eru nso nloghachi n'etiti ụnwayọ ọnwa, mana na January 15, ọ nọpụrụ iche maka izu abụọ ma ọ bụ a anọ ka ọ nwesịrị ihe ndọghachi azụ n'oge mgbake ya.

. [12]Na February 1, 2018, a na-ere Allen, ya na Ömer Aşık, Jameer Nelson na nchekwa nke mbụ, na Chicago Bulls maka inye maka Nikola Mirotić na 2018 nke abụọ. Na mgbakwunye, Chicago ga-enwe ikike ikike nke agba nke abụọ nke 2021 ya na nhọrọ agba nke abụọ nke New Orleans nke 2021. [1] Ndị Bulls na-eme Allen ụbọchị ndị ka e nyere tupu ọ pụta n'ike maka ha

[13]Na-eso na 6 ụkwụ 4 inch n'ogologo (1.93 m) na arọ arọ 213 pound (97) kg), Allen na-akpa ma onye nche agbapụ na obere ọnọdụ ihu . A mara Allen dị ka onye ihe, onye na-akpa ihe niile ma na-ekenyekarị ya ịgbachitere swingman dị elu, na-eme ka ọ mba iru ala maka egwuregwu ịme akara megide ya. [1] Akpọrọ Allen na NBA All-Defensive Team isii n'ime ugboro asaa site na 2011 ruo 2017 . [2]

. [14]Na February 26, 2016, egwuregwu egwuregwu Los Angeles Lakers, Kobe Bryant nyere Allen akpụkpọ ụkwụ akpaaka nke na-agụ "Na Tony, onye na-akpa kacha mma m chere ihu!" Ndị egwuregwu ahụ hụrụ n'anya maka egwuregwu ahụ

Dịka Boston Celtic, ndị otu ya nyere Allen aha "Gucci" aha. [15] Na Grizzlies, ọ nwetara aha otutu "nna nna". [16]

. [1]Allen bụ nwa Ella Allen. O nwere ike abụọ, Ebony na Dominique, na nwanne nwoke, Ryan, bụ onye na-ahụ egwu na Grizzlies '2012 Summer league squad na-esote ọrụ afọ anọ na Wisconsin-Milwaukee

Na Nọvemba 2005, e boro Allen ebubo atọ nke batrị ka njọ na-eso ọgụ nke butere agbapụ n'August 2005 na Chicago. [17] Achọtaghị ya ikpe n'ikpe n'April 2007. [18]

[19]Na Ọktoba 7, 2021, e boro Allen ebubo maka wayo nkwado na South District nke New York maka ebubo na ọ na-aghọgbu ọbụbụ uru na ụdị nke NBA
